%YAML 1.2
--- |

  <%include file="../../python_stretch.include"/>

  RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python3.5 python3-all-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
  RUN curl -f https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py | python3.5
